## Quarto
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

shinys <- list.dirs("..") %>% 
  tibble(sti = .) %>% 
  filter(str_starts(sti, pattern = "\\.\\.\\/\\.", negate = TRUE)) %>% 
  filter(sti != "..") %>% 
  filter(sti != "/index")
shinys
```

```{r}
find_meta <- function(x){
  read_lines(paste0(x,"/meta.txt"))
}
x <- "/TFCD"
read_lines(paste0(x, "/meta.txt"))

get_meta <- function(x) {
  res <- tryCatch({
    read_lines(paste0(x, "/meta.txt"))
  }, error = function(e) {
    "not found"
  })
  return(res)
}

get_logo <- function(x){
  sti <- paste0(x, "/logo.png")
  if(file.exists(paste0(sti))){
    return(sti)
  }else{
    return("not found")
  }
}

file.exists()
```

```{r}
shinys %>% 
  mutate(meta = map_chr(sti, get_meta),
         logo = map_chr(sti, get_logo)
         )
```
